bill.title: State health plan; prohibit false claims.
bill.description: An Act To Prohibit False Claims Against A State Health Plan; To Define Certain Terms; To Provide Penalties For Making False Claims; To Authorize Civil Actions Under This Act; To Provide Remedies In Civil Actions; To Require Investigations Of Claims; To Authorize State Intervention; To Provide Certain Powers And Duties Of The Courts Under This Act; To Provide For Damages; To Prohibit Retaliatory Actions And Provide Remedies For Retaliatory Actions; To Require Disclosure; To Require Reports To The Legislature; To Bring Forward Sections 25-15-3, 25-15-5, 43-13-203, 43-13-205, 43-13-211, 43-13-213, 43-13-215, 43-13-217, 43-13-219, 43-13-221, 43-13-223 And 43-13-225, Mississippi Code Of 1972, For Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
